## DurableOperation.getCallbackDetails() method

Gets the details for a callback operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCallbackDetails(): CallbackDetails<TResult> | undefined;
```

**Returns:**

[CallbackDetails](./durable-execution-sdk-js-testing.callbackdetails.md)<!-- -->&lt;TResult&gt; \| undefined

The callback operation details, or undefined if no operation data is available

## Exceptions

Will throw an error if the operation is not a valid callback type
